The Ultimate Minecraft Creator: The Unofficial Building Guide to Minecraft & Other Games is about sharing those brilliant, innovative, and unique creations that the players of the world have made inside this massively popular game. In this book, players will find everything from dazzling medieval castles that soar up to meet the sky, to sprawling underwater bases that are so high-tech they give most sci-fi films a run for their money.
